name: Ecosysmall
description:
And there it is !

Ecosysmall is a game where the player controls the weather of a small island, to influence the development of it's ecosystem. Watch as the grass grows, the sheep eats it, and the wolves feast on them!

Made by 6 people, mostly from Asobo Studio.

PS: The randomness can kick your ass, don't hesitate to reset the level!
